mainHero.title: Welcome to Softnet
mainHero.subtitle: We delivers solutions
mainHero.description: Softnet Share Company (Softnet S.C) is a technology firm specializing in comprehensive technology training, tailored software development, and end-to-end technology infrastructure solutions.

items.title: Technology Trainings
items.description: From coding to web development, we offer specialized programs for all age groups, starting as young as 10 years old.

items.title: Technology Infrastructure Resale and Deployment
items.description: End-to-end services guaranteeing seamless integration and optimal performance of your technology infrastructure.

items.title: Software Development
items.description: We craft scalable, secure, and user-friendly software applications to enhance productivity and streamline your business processes

items.title: Information Technology outsourcing (ITO)
items.description: Softnet Share Company (Softnet S.C), your ultimate partner for outsourced services that redefine excellence. Dive into a realm where professionalism, top-tier quality, and punctuality converge to elevate your business ventures. We unveil our specialized services, encompassing web development, data encoding, contact center operations, executed with unmatched precision and dedication.

features.title: Founders Message
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: Softnet Share Company founded by a visionary alliance of tech-savvy innovators and astute business experts, a collective with a resolute mission: to unlock the boundless potential of communities through the dynamic force of technology. Their journey began with a unified vision, understanding that in this rapidly evolving digital landscape, the ability to innovate and embrace change is the key to empowerment. With each line of code, each strategic partnership, and each community engagement initiative, Softnet Share Company stands as a beacon of progress, propelling towards a future where technology's transformative might propels humanity forward on a global scale.

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.

about.disc: Softnet Share Company (Softnet S.C) is a technology firm specializing in comprehensive technology training, tailored software development, and end-to-end technology infrastructure solutions.

sections.name: Mission
sections.content: Our mission is to provide creative and innovative technology solutions that effectively address the challenges of our community, while also ensuring that these solutions are scalable and globally applicable.

sections.name: Vision
sections.content: Our vision is to be an exceptional and sustainable Ethiopian company that delivers innovative technology solutions that have a significant positive impact on people's lives.

sections.title: Commitment to Excellence
sections.disc: We provide exceptional services to maintaining strong relationships with our clients.

sections.title: Comprehensive Training Programs
sections.disc: Our diverse array of technology training programs caters to learners of all ages and skill levels, ensuring a holistic and enriching skill development experience

sections.title: Inclusive Learning Environment
sections.disc: Our specialized programs for children starting from the age of 8 foster a love for technology from an early age.

sections.title: Reliable After-Sales Support
sections.disc: Your journey with Softnet doesn't end with a service, it begins. We're dedicated to providing reliable after-sales support, assisting you, resolving issues, and ensuring your continued success in utilizing our technology solutions.

sections.title: Expertise and Experience
sections.disc: Backed by a team of highly skilled technology and business experts with extensive industry experience, we assure you the highest quality of service delivery.

sections.title: Customized Solutions
sections.disc: Recognizing the uniqueness of every business, we tailor our solutions to precisely address specific requirements and objectives, providing optimal and personalized results.
